Test Case Details: User login with valid credentials and navigate to products page
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /web/login
2. Enter valid email and password
3. Click Login
4. Navigate to /web/products
Post-Condition: User logged in and on products page
Expected Results: Should successfully login and redirect to products page

Test Case Details: Click View Details button for first product and save product data
Pre-Condition: User logged in and on products page
Test Steps:
1. Click View Details button for first product
2. Save product data (name; category; price) for comparison
Expected Results: Should navigate to /web/products/{id} and save product data

Test Case Details: Check if product image exists on product details page
Test Steps:
1. Verify product image is visible
2. Check image element exists
Expected Results: Product image should be visible and displayed correctly

Test Case Details: Check if product stock badge exists and displays correctly
Test Steps:
1. Verify product-stock-badge is visible
2. Check badge shows 'In Stock' or 'Out of Stock'
Expected Results: Stock badge should be visible with correct status

Test Case Details: Check product name matches saved data from products page
Pre-Condition: User on product details page with saved product data
Test Steps:
1. Get product name from details page
2. Compare with saved product name from products page
Expected Results: Product name should match saved data exactly

Test Case Details: Check product category matches saved data
Pre-Condition: User on product details page with saved product data
Test Steps:
1. Get product category from details page
2. Compare with saved category from products page
Expected Results: Product category should match saved data exactly

Test Case Details: Check price displays correctly with valid format and data type
Test Steps:
1. Get product price
2. Verify price format is $XX.XX
3. Verify price is a valid number
Expected Results: Price should display in format $XX.XX with 2 decimal places

Test Case Details: Check stars rating and reviews count are valid (reviews <= 5)
Test Steps:
1. Get product stars rating
2. Get reviews count
3. Verify stars are between 0-5
4. Verify reviews count <= 5
Expected Results: Stars should be 0-5; reviews count should be <= 5

Test Case Details: Check product description is displayed
Test Steps:
1. Get product-detail-description
2. Verify description text exists
Expected Results: Product description should be visible and not empty

Test Case Details: Check product-detail-stock displays correctly
Test Steps:
1. Get product-detail-stock value
2. Verify stock information is displayed
Expected Results: Stock information should be visible (e.g.

Test Case Details: Check btn-increase-qty button is visible and functional
Test Steps:
1. Verify btn-increase-qty button is visible
2. Click button to increase quantity
Expected Results: Increase quantity button should be visible and functional

Test Case Details: Check btn-decrease-qty button is visible and functional
Test Steps:
1. Verify btn-decrease-qty button is visible
2. Click button to decrease quantity
Expected Results: Decrease quantity button should be visible and functional

Test Case Details: Set quantity to 3 and verify quantity in cart
Pre-Condition: User on product details page with empty cart
Test Steps:
1. Clear cart first
2. Set quantity-input to 3
3. Click Add to Cart
4. Verify cart contains 3 quantity of product
Post-Condition: Product added to cart with quantity 3
Expected Results: Cart should show 3 quantity for the product

Test Case Details: Check btn-like-product button and alert if already liked
Test Steps:
1. Click btn-like-product button
2. Check for alert message
3. If already liked; verify alert: 'You have already liked this product!'
Expected Results: Like button should work; alert shown if already liked

Test Case Details: Check btn-add-to-wishlist button and alerts
Test Steps:
1. Click btn-add-to-wishlist button
2. Check for alert message
3. Verify alert: 'Item added to wishlist' or 'Product already in wishlist'
Expected Results: Wishlist button should work; appropriate alert shown

Test Case Details: Check btn-back-to-products navigation
Test Steps:
1. Click btn-back-to-products button
2. Verify navigation to /web/products
Expected Results: Should navigate back to /web/products page

Test Case Details: Check btn-write-review and review-form; verify review is posted
Test Steps:
1. Click btn-write-review button
2. Verify review-form is visible
3. Fill review form and submit
4. Verify review is posted
Expected Results: Review form should appear; review should be posted after submission

Test Case Details: Check avg-rating-value displays correctly
Test Steps:
1. Get avg-rating-value
2. Verify rating value is displayed
Expected Results: Average rating value should be visible (e.g.

Test Case Details: Check avg-rating-stars displays correctly
Test Steps:
1. Get avg-rating-stars
2. Verify stars are displayed (0-5 stars)
Expected Results: Average rating stars should be visible (0-5 stars)

Test Case Details: Check total-reviews-count displays correctly
Test Steps:
1. Get total-reviews-count
2. Verify count is displayed
Expected Results: Total reviews count should be visible and accurate

Test Case Details: Check reviews-list and review-card content
Test Steps:
1. Verify reviews-list is visible
2. Check review-card elements exist
3. Verify review-card contains rating; date; and comment
Expected Results: Reviews list should be visible; review cards should display rating; date; and comment

Test Case Details: Check tab-header-specifications is clickable
Test Steps:
1. Click tab-header-specifications
2. Verify specifications tab is displayed
Expected Results: Specifications tab should be clickable and display content

Test Case Details: Check Product ID; Category; Stock; Price; Added Date in specifications
Pre-Condition: User on product details page with specifications tab open
Test Steps:
1. Verify Product ID is displayed
2. Verify Category is displayed
3. Verify Stock is displayed
4. Verify Price is displayed
5. Verify Added Date is displayed
Expected Results: All specification fields should be visible and correct

Test Case Details: Check what actions non-registered user can perform
Test Steps:
1. Logout if logged in
2. Navigate to product details page
3. Try to add to cart; like; or write review
4. Verify appropriate restrictions or login prompts
Post-Condition: User remains on product details or redirected to login
Expected Results: Non-registered users should see login prompts for restricted actions
